00028 #ifndef __PlaneBoundedVolume_H_
00029 #define __PlaneBoundedVolume_H_
00030 
00031 // Precompiler options
00032 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00033 #include "OgreAxisAlignedBox.h"
00034 #include "OgreSphere.h"
00035 #include "OgreMath.h"
00036 #include "OgrePlane.h"
00037 
00038 namespace Ogre {
00039 
00048     class _OgreExport PlaneBoundedVolume
00049     {
00050     public:
00051         typedef vector<Plane>::type PlaneList;
00053         PlaneList planes;
00054         Plane::Side outside;
00055 
00056         PlaneBoundedVolume() :outside(Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE) {}
00058         PlaneBoundedVolume(Plane::Side theOutside) 
00059             : outside(theOutside) {}
00060 
00064         inline bool intersects(const AxisAlignedBox& box) const
00065         {
00066             if (box.isNull()) return false;
00067             if (box.isInfinite()) return true;
00068 
00069             // Get centre of the box
00070             Vector3 centre = box.getCenter();
00071             // Get the half-size of the box
00072             Vector3 halfSize = box.getHalfSize();
00073             
00074             PlaneList::const_iterator i, iend;
00075             iend = planes.end();
00076             for (i = planes.begin(); i != iend; ++i)
00077             {
00078                 const Plane& plane = *i;
00079 
00080                 Plane::Side side = plane.getSide(centre, halfSize);
00081                 if (side == outside)
00082                 {
00083                     // Found a splitting plane therefore return not intersecting
00084                     return false;
00085                 }
00086             }
00087 
00088             // couldn't find a splitting plane, assume intersecting
00089             return true;
00090 
00091         }
00095         inline bool intersects(const Sphere& sphere) const
00096         {
00097             PlaneList::const_iterator i, iend;
00098             iend = planes.end();
00099             for (i = planes.begin(); i != iend; ++i)
00100             {
00101                 const Plane& plane = *i;
00102 
00103                 // Test which side of the plane the sphere is
00104                 Real d = plane.getDistance(sphere.getCenter());
00105                 // Negate d if planes point inwards
00106                 if (outside == Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE) d = -d;
00107 
00108                 if ( (d - sphere.getRadius()) > 0)
00109                     return false;
00110             }
00111 
00112             return true;
00113 
00114         }
00115 
00120         inline std::pair<bool, Real> intersects(const Ray& ray)
00121         {
00122             return Math::intersects(ray, planes, outside == Plane::POSITIVE_SIDE);
00123         }
00124 
00125     };
00126 
00127     typedef vector<PlaneBoundedVolume>::type PlaneBoundedVolumeList;
00128 
00132 }
00133 
00134 #endif
